title: The heire an excellent comedie. As it was lately acted by the Company of the Reuels. / Writren [sic] by T.M. Gent..
author: May, Thomas, 1595-1650.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] for Thomas Iones, and are to bee sold at his shop in Chancery-lane, ouer-against the Roles, and in Westminster Hall.,
